name: Restpose
body:
### RestPose

RestPose is a search server based on [Xapian](http://xapian.org).

### Documentation

 - [RestPose server](http://restpose.readthedocs.org/)
 - [RestPose Python client](http://restpose-py.readthedocs.org/)

### Development

 - [RestPose server](http://github.com/restpose/restpose) - the server itself
 - [RestPose python client](http://github.com/restpose/restpose-py) - a Python client for RestPose
 - [RestPose webapp](http://github.com/restpose/rspview) - a simple webapp interface to restpose
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
